metadata.title: CVE-2021-4183 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Crash in the pcapng file parser in Wireshark 3.6.0 allows denial of servicevia crafted capture file

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.2.3-1
libwireshark13 - 3.2.3-1
libwiretap10 - 3.2.3-1
libwsutil11 - 3.2.3-1
tshark - 3.2.3-1
wireshark - 3.2.3-1
wireshark-common - 3.2.3-1
wireshark-gtk - 3.2.3-1
wireshark-qt - 3.2.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.3-1').
